naslov: Podstrana, LUKSUZNA VILLA / PANORAMSKI POGLED MORE - video / čitaj (prodaja)
opis: - prodaja agencije #adriaINgroup - kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju 3% od prodajne cijene Cijenjeni klijenti, razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani posrednički ugovor koji je temelj za daljnje radnje vezane za kupoprodaju, a sve sukladno Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina.Agencija je u sustavu pdv-a te se na sve usluge obračunava pdv. NAPOMENA: detaljne slike i video, tlocrte vile šaljemo na upit ! - vila u vlasništvu tvrtke - mogućnost dodatne kupnje slične susjedne vile (trenutno ROH-BAU / planirano useljenje ljeto 2024.godine) Ako tražite savršeno mjesto za odmor ili život, ne tražite dalje. Prodajemo luksuznu vilu u mirnom i lijepom dijelu Podstrane. Vila je površine 280m2 uključujući krovnu terasu (netto stambeno 210m2) na okućnici od 610m2, ima tri spavaće sobe sa kupaonicama, prostrani dnevni boravak, kuhinju, blagovaonicu i terasu... - opremljena svim modernim brendiranim uređajima i sadržajima. + PRIZEMLJE: dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonom, sprema, kupatilo... + 1.KAT: tri spavaće sobe sa kupatilima + krovna terasa + gradnja 2022.godine + energetska vrijednost A + vanjski bazen (24m2), parking, video nadzor... Najveća prednost ove vile je njen predivan pogled na more, koji se pruža sa svake etaže. Vila je udaljena zračne linije cca 500 metara od plaže, gdje možete plivati, sunčati se ili se baviti vodenim sportovima. U blizini su i brojni restorani, kafići, trgovine i kulturne znamenitosti... Podstrana su idealno mjesto za odmor ili život, jer nudi razne aktivnosti i sadržaje za sve uzraste i ukuse. DETALJI NA UPIT eng............................................................. - sale of #adriaINgroup agency - the buyer pays an agency commission of 3% + vat of the sales price Dear clients, viewing the property is only possible with a signed brokerage contract, which is the basis for further actions related to the sale, and all in accordance with the Act on Brokerage in Real Estate Transactions. NOTE: detailed pictures and video, villa floor plans are sent on request! - a villa owned by the company - the possibility of additional purchase of a similar neighboring villa (currently ROH-BAU / planned move-in summer 2024) If you are looking for the perfect place to vacation or live, look no further. We are selling a luxury villa in a quiet and beautiful part of Podstrana. The villa has an area of 280m2 including a roof terrace (net residential area 210m2) on a plot of 610m2, it has three bedrooms with bathrooms, a spacious living room, kitchen, dining room and terrace... - equipped with all modern branded devices and contents. + GROUND FLOOR: living room with kitchen and dining room, utility room, bathroom... + 1ST FLOOR: three bedrooms with bathrooms + roof terrace + construction in 2022 + energy value A + outdoor pool (24m2), parking, video surveillance... The biggest advantage of this villa is its wonderful view of the sea, which extends from every floor. The villa is approximately 500 meters from the beach, where you can swim, sunbathe or engage in water sports. There are numerous restaurants, cafes, shops and cultural sights nearby... Podstrana is an ideal place for vacation or life, because it offers various activities and facilities for all ages and tastes.
